Class EntityManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xenei.jena.entities.impl.EntityManagerImpl

    EntityManager

    public class EntityManagerImpl
extends Object
implements EntityManager
    An implementation of the EntityManager interface.

      • registerTypes

        public static void registerTypes()

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Description copied from interface: EntityManager
        Reset the entity manager to its initial state. any pending updates are discarded. internal structures are reset to remote values.
        Specified by:
        reset in interface EntityManager

      • addInstanceProperties

        public <T> T addInstanceProperties(T source,
                                   Class<?> clazz)
                            throws MissingAnnotation,
                                   IllegalArgumentException
        Read an instance of clazz from Object source. If source does not have the required types as defined in the Subject annotation of clazz they will be added.

        This method may modify the graph and should be called within the scope of a transaction if the underlying graph requires them.

        Specified by:
        addInstanceProperties in interface EntityManager
        Type Parameters:
        T - the instance type to return.
        Parameters:
        source - Must either implement Resource or ResourceWrapper interfaces.
        clazz - The class containing the Subject annotation.
        Returns:
        source for chaining
        Throws:
        MissingAnnotation - if clazz does not have Subject annotations.
        IllegalArgumentException - if source implements neither Resource nor ResourceWrapper.

      • getSubject

        public Subject getSubject(Class<?> clazz)
        Description copied from interface: EntityManager
        Get the subject annotation for the class. Returns the Subject annotation if it exists for the class. Searches the super classes for the subject annotation. If no annotation is found in the super classes all the interfaces are searched and the first interface that contains the annotation is returned.
        Specified by:
        getSubject in interface EntityManager
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to get the subject for.
        Returns:
        the Subject annotation or null if no annotation is found.

      • getSubjectInfo

        public SubjectInfo getSubjectInfo(Class<?> clazz)
        Description copied from interface: EntityManager
        Get the SubjectInfo for the class.
        Specified by:
        getSubjectInfo in interface EntityManager
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to get SubjectInfo for.
        Returns:
        The SubjectInfo

      • isInstance

        public boolean isInstance(Object target,
                          Class<?> clazz)
        Description copied from interface: EntityManager
        Determine if target has all the properties required in the Subject( type ) annotation value. If target is not a Resource or ResourceWrapper returns false.
        Specified by:
        isInstance in interface EntityManager
        Parameters:
        target - The object to check.
        clazz - A Subject annotated class.
        Returns:
        true if the resource represented by target has all of the required type predicates.

      • parseClasses

        public void parseClasses(String packageName)
                  throws MissingAnnotation
        Description copied from interface: EntityManager
        Parses the the classes in a package (and subpackages) looking for Subject annotated classes. Classes are located using classLoader.getResource(packageAsPath)
        Specified by:
        parseClasses in interface EntityManager
        Parameters:
        packageName - The name of the package to process
        Throws:
        MissingAnnotation - if a subject annotated class has no predicate annotations.
        See Also:
        If any Subject annotated classes are missing required annotations, a log entry is written. If any Subject annotated classes faild parsing a MissingAnnotation exception is thrown after all classes have been processed.

      • parseClasses

        public void parseClasses(String[] packageNames)
                  throws MissingAnnotation
        Description copied from interface: EntityManager
        Parses the the classes in an array of packages (and subpackages) looking for Subject annotated classes. Classes are located using classLoader.getResource(packageAsPath) If any Subject annotated classes are missing required annotations, a log entry is written. If any Subject annotated classes faild parsing a MissingAnnotation exception is thrown after all classes have been processed.
        Specified by:
        parseClasses in interface EntityManager
        Parameters:
        packageNames - The array of package names to process
        Throws:
        MissingAnnotation - if a subject annotated class has not predicate annotations.
        See Also:
        ClassLoader.getResources(String)

      • make

        public <T> T make(Object source,
                  Class<T> primaryClass,
                  Class<?>... secondaryClasses)
           throws MissingAnnotation
        Description copied from interface: EntityManager
        Make an instance of clazz from source. If source does not pass isInstance() check additional properties are added as required.
        Specified by:
        make in interface EntityManager
        Type Parameters:
        T - the instance type to return.
        Parameters:
        source - Must either implement Resource or ResourceWrapper interfaces.
        primaryClass - The class of the object to be returned.
        secondaryClasses - A lost of other classes that are implemented.
        Returns:
        primaryClass instance that also implements ResourceWrapper.
        Throws:
        MissingAnnotation - if any of the classes do not have Subject annotations.
        See Also:
        EntityManager.isInstance(Object, Class)

      • read

        public <T> T read(Object source,
                  Class<T> primaryClass,
                  Class<?>... secondaryClasses)
           throws MissingAnnotation,
                  IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: EntityManager
        Read an instance of clazz from source. Does not verify that the resource passes the isInstance() check.
        Specified by:
        read in interface EntityManager
        Type Parameters:
        T - the instance type to return.
        Parameters:
        source - Must either implement Resource or ResourceWrapper interfaces.
        primaryClass - The class of the object to be returned.
        secondaryClasses - AList lost of other classes that are implemented.
        Returns:
        primaryClass instance that also implements ResourceWrapper.
        Throws:
        MissingAnnotation - if any of the classes do not have Subject annotations.
        IllegalArgumentException - if source implements neither Resource nor ResourceWrapper.
        See Also:
        EntityManager.isInstance(Object, Class)

        Description copied from interface: EntityManager

        Specified by:

      • update

        public Object update(Object source,
                     Object target)
        Since the EntityManger implements the manager as a live data read against the Model, this method provides a mechanism to copy all the values from the source to the target. It reads scans the target class for "set" methods and the source class for associated "get" methods. If a pairing is found the value of the "get" call is passed to the "set" call.
        Specified by:
        update in interface EntityManager
        Parameters:
        source - The object that has the values to transfer.
        target - The object that has the receptors for the values.
        Returns:
        The target object after all setters have been called.

      • getSubjects

        public Collection<SubjectInfo> getSubjects()
        Description copied from interface: EntityManager
        Get all known subjects.
        Specified by:
        getSubjects in interface EntityManager
        Returns:
        The collection of SubjectInfo objects in this entitymanager

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(EntityManager.Listener listener)
        Description copied from interface: EntityManager
        Register a listener to this EntityManager. Listeners are held with weak references so if the listener can be garbage collected.
        Specified by:
        registerListener in interface EntityManager
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register.

      • unregisterListener

        public void unregisterListener(EntityManager.Listener listener)
        Description copied from interface: EntityManager
        Unregister a listener from this EntityManager.
        Specified by:
        unregisterListener in interface EntityManager
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to remove.

      • update

        public void update(org.apache.jena.update.UpdateRequest updateReq)
        Description copied from interface: EntityManager
        Do an update to the underlying system. If writeThrough is enabled the update is performed immediately and the system is resynced. If writeThrough is not enabled then the system will hold the changes until sync() is called
        Specified by:
        update in interface EntityManager
        Parameters:
        updateReq - the update to execute.
        See Also:
        EntityManager.sync()

      • sync

        public void sync()
        Description copied from interface: EntityManager
        Sync the system with the remote data store. If there are pending updates they will be executed and then the underlying graph synced.
        Specified by:
        sync in interface EntityManager
